channel.title: portfolio on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in portfolio on Konigi

item.title: Alan van Roemburg
item.description: A Melbourne based designer, specialising in graphic design, web design and icons. http://alanvanroemburg.com

item.title: Pete Usborne - Digital Designer
item.description: Pete Usborne is a British digital designer currently living and working in Sydney. This is the 2010 edition of his latest work http://www.buzzgraphics.co.uk

item.title: Dom Goodrum
item.description: Portfolio showcasing the favourite projects of designer Dom Goodrum. http://www.domgoodrum.com

item.title: Andy Ward
item.description: Portfolio showcasing the illustrations of Andy Ward http://www.andyward.co.uk/

item.title: Rich Brown
item.description: Portfolio showcasing the work of freelance interaction designer and digital creative Richard Brown. http://www.richbrown.info/

item.title: Pete Usborne - Oz Edition
item.description: The 2010 Portfolio (Oz Edition) of graphic and digital designer, Pete Usborne http://oz.buzzgraphics.co.uk/projects/samandbuzz.php

item.title: Zara Picken Illustration
item.description: Lovely minimalist portfolio of UK illustrator Zara Picken. http://www.zaraillustrates.com/index.html

item.title: Flutter + Wow
item.description: I like the prominent header, and the fun use of illustration on this site, especially in the header and footer. The grass overlapping tabs, and the whimsical footer tunnels are great. http://flutterandwow.com

item.title: Kleber Design Ltd.
item.description: I like the clever idea to use a flatpack package to frame this UK studio's portfolio. http://www.kleber.net/

item.title: Andy Shaw
item.description: Taking a portfolio site to the bare essentials. Links to the latest work & contact options. http://andyshaw.me

item.title: Joe
item.description: The whimsical sketched interface of Joe Davis' design portfolio. http://www.joedavis.co.uk/

item.title: Orange Label Design Studio
item.description: Very nice single-page portfolio from this web design studio. Reload the page a few times to change the large header graphic. The rip-off tabs for the downloadable questionnaires and company profile are a nice touch, as are the individually laid out work samples. Would be nice to see some jump navigation between categories of the beautiful work here. http://www.orangelabel.com/

item.title: Petra Quilitz
item.description: This is one perhaps one of the most attractive portfolios I've seen for an Info. Arch./Interaction Designer. Love the use of photography to highlight the nice large deliverables tacked on the walls. Great stuff. http://www.petraquilitz.com/

item.title: teoskaffa.com
item.description: Teo Skaffa's fun portfolio is like a tribute to 8 bit game consoles. Huge pixelated text and pointers, dinging mouseovers that make you half expect coins to pop out of links, and a keyboard navigation make this site a pleasure for NES nostalgists. http://www.teoskaffa.com/

item.title: Crayons Life
item.description: The portfolio of illustrator and web designer Jessette Dayate, which pays homage to the crayon. http://www.crayonslife.com/
